title: Startups & Scale-ups
content:
I help early-stage and growing companies build/scale a solid technical foundation without the need for a full-time hire.

From releasing your MVP to setting up scalable and robus infrastructure, I ensure your platform and team is ready to grow. When things get serious, I'm here to jump in and work together.

title: Digital Agencies
content:
I partner with digital agencies to streamline their technical delivery.

From building reusable platforms to improving deployment pipelines and ensuring robust incident management, I help you deliver high-quality solutions to your clientsâ€”on time and on budget.

title: Enterprises
content:
I help established companies modernize their legacy systems and adopt cloud-native practices.

From architecture reviews to DevOps transformation, I ensure your systems are scalable, secure, and aligned with your business goals.
